theorem P3_iff_exists_open_subset_closure_eq_closure
    {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P3 (A : Set X) ↔
      ∃ U : Set X, IsOpen U ∧ (A : Set X) ⊆ U ∧ closure U = closure A := by
  classical
  constructor
  · intro hP3
    refine
      ⟨interior (closure (A : Set X)), isOpen_interior, ?_, ?_⟩
    · -- `A ⊆ interior (closure A)` by `P3`.
      simpa using hP3
    · -- Show `closure (interior (closure A)) = closure A`.
      have h₁ :
          closure (interior (closure (A : Set X))) ⊆ closure A := by
        exact
          closure_mono
            (interior_subset :
              interior (closure (A : Set X)) ⊆ closure A)
      have h₂ : closure A ⊆ closure (interior (closure (A : Set X))) := by
        exact closure_mono hP3
      exact subset_antisymm h₁ h₂
  · rintro ⟨U, hOpenU, hASubU, hClEq⟩
    -- Aim: `A ⊆ interior (closure A)`.
    dsimp [Topology.P3]
    intro x hxA
    -- First, place `x` in `U`.
    have hxU : x ∈ U := hASubU hxA
    -- Show `U ⊆ interior (closure U)`.
    have hUsub :
        (U : Set X) ⊆ interior (closure U) := by
      -- Since `U` is open, `interior U = U`.
      have hIntU : interior (U : Set X) = U := hOpenU.interior_eq
      -- Monotonicity of `interior` with `U ⊆ closure U`.
      have hIncl :
          interior (U : Set X) ⊆ interior (closure U) :=
        interior_mono (subset_closure : (U : Set X) ⊆ closure U)
      simpa [hIntU] using hIncl
    -- Convert via the equality of closures.
    have hIntEq :
        interior (closure U) = interior (closure (A : Set X)) := by
      simpa [hClEq]
    have hxInt : x ∈ interior (closure U) := hUsub hxU
    simpa [hIntEq] using hxInt

theorem P2_implies_P3_alt {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P2 (A : Set X) → Topology.P3 A := by
  intro hP2
  dsimp [Topology.P2, Topology.P3] at *
  -- `closure (interior A)` sits inside `closure A`.
  have h₁ : closure (interior (A : Set X)) ⊆ closure A :=
    closure_mono (interior_subset : interior (A : Set X) ⊆ A)
  -- Taking interiors preserves the inclusion.
  have h₂ :
      interior (closure (interior A)) ⊆ interior (closure A) :=
    interior_mono h₁
  exact hP2.trans h₂
